solvna.title: Solvna
solvna.description: A single player divination game, using cards 1 to 6 from a traditional deck.

scoundrel.title: Scoundrel
scoundrel.description: A solo dungeon-crawler played with a standard deck of cards.

lonely-hearts.title: Lonely Hearts
lonely-hearts.description: No one to play Hearts with? Try this solitaire version of the standard card game.

card-capture.title: Card Capture
card-capture.description: A solo deckbuilder, using a single deck of standard playing cards.
